page.title: 11Farming.
page.content: There are two types of Farming,dairy and arable.There are three kinds of crops,barley,oats and wheat.Barley does not grow very well in this area because the land is grade two which is not the best.Mr.Dickinson grows barley every year.If the barley has a good crop one year then it will be imported. Oats are the best crop that Mr.Dickinson grows.He grows them every year because it is a great success.Oats are imported just like barley.They plant oats and other crops with a precision drill.He sells them to Quakers,horse trainers and horse owners.Oats are a useful crop because they put goodness into the soil.He also grows wheat every year in different fields.If he gets a good crop then it will be made into cow food or biscuits.
